TopicDetails.title: law enforcement cooperation Silk Road Migration Route
TopicDetails.callTitle: Call for proposals restricted to Member States for law enforcement cooperation between Member States and relevant third countries along the Silk Road Migration Route to better address and improve the detection and apprehension of migrant smugglers

latestInfos.content: The present Call for Proposals aims at funding projects in the area of law enforcement cooperation between one or more EU Member States and the respective law enforcement authorities of Pakistan and Afghanistan.

TopicDetails.conditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of eligible countries:
    All EU Member States, with the exception of the United Kingdom and Denmark.
     
  2. Admissibility requirements and eligibility criteria: See sections 5 and 6 of the Call for proposals document.
  3. Indicative timetable for evaluation and contract signature: See section 3 of the Call for proposals document.
  4. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:

    Call for proposals document
    Guide for applicants
    Standard proposal template – AMIF, ISFB and ISFP
    Model grant agreement for multi-beneficiary grants
     
  5. Additional documents:

    ISFP annual work plan 2016
    ISFP legal basis
    EU Financial regulation
TopicDetails.supportInfo:
Contact the HOME-ISF@ec.europa.eu for further assistance related to content of the call and topics.

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals.

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

H2020 Online Manual - Please use the manual with caution and only for the Participant Portal tools guidance, i.e. Submission service and Beneficiary register. It is H2020 specific and does not cover the ISFP rules. Some aspects of these funds are different from the provisions of the H2020 programme.
TopicDetails.sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action and topic, as these cannot be changed in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.

latestInfos.content: The submission session is now available for: ISFP-2016-AG-SRMR-01(ISFP-AG)
